title: 7 "The Izu Two-Faced Oni - Part IV"(Japanese:「左近からくり変化の章」〜第一段〜) November 12, 1999(1999-11-12)
transformers_text: 7 The I zu Two Faced On i Part IV Japanese November 12 1999 1999 11 12 Sakon deduces that Ya gi saw a committed suicide to protect the identity of Sato Mai's mother who killed her abusive husband in the puppet mansion 16 years ago and who has been managing Mai under an assumed identity Sakon reveals that it was Sato who killed Sugiyama because he was blackmailing her
tf_idf_text: two faced part japanese november sakon deduces saw committed suicide protect identity sato mais mother kill abusive husband puppet mansion year ago manage mai assume identity sakon reveals sato kill sugiyama blackmailing
